Regulation Name(s): Herpes Simplex Virus Nucleic Acid Amplification Assay
Specimen Container(s): MSwab Collection, Transport and Preservation System (Copan Flock Technologies)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for cobas® HSV 1 and 2 Test, a qualitative real-time PCR assay for detection and differentiation of HSV-1 and HSV-2 DNA in external anogenital lesion specimens on the cobas® 4800 system
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative detection and differentiation of HSV-1 and HSV-2 DNA in clinician-collected external anogenital lesion specimens from symptomatic patients, as an aid in diagnosing anogenital HSV-1 and HSV-2 infections; not cleared for cerebrospinal fluid, prenatal screening, or use in individuals under 18 years.
